Title: Object: La fuite en Egypte
Series: Musée Français
Description: The Flight into Egypt; classical scene with the Holy Family stepping over rocks in foreground, the Virgin carrying the Child while Joseph holds the donkey; after Adriaen van der Werff Etching and engraving
Producer name: Print made by: Jean Jacques Avril
Curator's comments: From Musée Français, see 1875,0410.469 for comment on the set. After the 1710 painting by Adriaen van der Werff in the Mauritshuis, The Hague, inv.no.209; see Barbara Gaehtgens, 'Adriaen van der Werff 1659-1722', Munich, 1987, cat.no.74. It was painted on the occasion of the eightteenth brithday of the artist's daughter Maria.
